QuestData.Title: Argent Aid
QuestData.Description: There were rumors about the events you speak of among the death knights. I always expected the story to be more... symbolic.$B$BWe must warn others, but we must be discreet. As soon as the Lich King knows we're making our move, he'll move the location of the heart -- we'll never get a chance like this again.$B$BThe Horde and the Alliance have been infiltrated by the Cult of the Damned before. The Ebon Blade operates too close to the Scourge.$B$BWe have to speak to Tirion Fordring and his Argent Crusade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Highlord Tirion Fordring at the Crusader's Pinnacle.
QuestData.RewardText: Heavy words, $n. If it were somebody else saying them, I'd be likely to judge them insane.
